alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Edgefield and east central McCormick Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 7 miles east of Mccormick County Airport, or 22 miles south of Greenwood, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Strom Thurmond High School, Cleora, and Edgefield Federal Correction Institution. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
